metadata.title: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
metadata.subtitle: Become the DevOps Architect That Companies Fight For
metadata.description: The world runs on software, and software gets deployed by DevOps engineers. This course transforms you from someone who deploys code into someone who builds the pipelines that power the world's most critical applications. You'll master the Azure DevOps tools and practices that separate the engineers who get hired from those who don't.
prerequisites: Experience with Azure administration or development
Understanding of agile practices and version control
Basic knowledge of scripting (PowerShell, Bash, or Python)
A burning desire to master the deployment pipelines that power the modern world

highlights: Master the deployment pipelines that power Fortune 500 companies
Build infrastructure that automatically scales and heals itself
Learn the security practices that protect billions in revenue
Join the elite engineers who deploy code that changes the world

overview.summary: Every great product needs a great DevOps engineer behind it. This course teaches you the Azure DevOps skills that separate the engineers who build deployment pipelines from those who build the systems that power them. You'll learn to create infrastructure that deploys itself, pipelines that catch bugs before they reach production, and monitoring systems that predict failures before they happen. By the end, you'll have the technical mastery and architectural vision to lead DevOps transformations at any organization.
objectives: Master Azure DevOps security and compliance frameworks
Build infrastructure that deploys and manages itself
Create CI/CD pipelines that guarantee quality and speed
Implement monitoring systems that predict and prevent failures
Design dependency management that eliminates deployment conflicts
Architect application infrastructure that scales automatically
Build feedback loops that continuously improve development processes
overview.targetAudience: This course is for the engineers who are ready to become the architects of deployment. Whether you're a developer who wants to master the deployment side, a sysadmin ready to embrace DevOps culture, or an IT professional who wants to lead digital transformations - if you want to build the systems that make software deployment invisible and flawless, this course will give you the skills and mindset to become the DevOps engineer that companies compete for.

faq.question: What are the prerequisites for this course?
faq.answer: You should have experience with Azure administration or development, and familiarity with agile practices and version control.

faq.question: Do I need programming experience?
faq.answer: Yes, you should be comfortable with scripting languages like PowerShell, Bash, or Python for automation tasks.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn Azure DevOps, Azure Resource Manager, Bicep, Azure CLI, Git, and various monitoring tools.

faq.question: Is this course hands-on?
faq.answer: Yes, this course includes extensive hands-on labs where you'll build complete CI/CD pipelines and implement DevOps practices.
